title: Should I wait for an iPhone 13? - Quora

response.answer_text: Skip the 13 and wait for the 14 it promises to be faster, then again there’s always the 15. if you are going to wait for the newest it will never happen. Before the next iPhone is launched engineers are already planning the next one.

I would, but it's a personal choice. They have great performance & breathtaking video recording capabilities. But any phone above 40k should definitely have high refresh rate of at least 120 Hz. It really makes the smartphone usage experience butter smooth
